source.name: Identifying Bot Capabilities
source.instructions: **Which of these scenarios can be handled by a Level 1 bot that can only handle responses?**

answers.answer: Processing a payment (requires payment details and processing)
Explaining how to use a feature

source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify which scenarios can be handled by a Level 1 bot
source.guidance:
Level 1 bots can only provide information but cannot remember anything or perform actions. Therefore:

- **Can handle**: Providing company contact information, listing product features, explaining how to use a feature (these only require providing information)

- **Cannot handle**: Checking account balance (requires remembering the account number), processing a payment (requires both memory for details and code to execute the payment), and remembering user preferences (requires memory/slots)
